description:
This is a library module offering the same set of functions
 defined by Microsoft Excel, under Information Functions.

functions.name: is-blank
functions.description: Test if the passed argument is empty of not.
functions.summary: Test if the passed argument is empty of not.

returns.description: If the value of $arg is the empty sequence, the function returns true, otherwise the function returns false.

functions.name: is-even
functions.description: Test is a number is even.
functions.summary: Test is a number is even.

returns.description: TRUE if number is even, FALSE if number is odd.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value is not a number.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: is-odd
functions.description: Test is a number is odd.
functions.summary: Test is a number is odd.

returns.description: TRUE if number is odd, FALSE if number is even.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value is not a number.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: islogical
functions.description: Tests if the passed $value is a logical value.
functions.summary: Tests if the passed $value is a logical value.

returns.description: TRUE if $value refers to a logical value.

functions.name: isnumber
functions.description: Tests if the passed $value is a number.
functions.summary: Tests if the passed $value is a number.

returns.description: TRUE if $value refers to a number.

functions.name: istext
functions.description: Tests if the passed $value is a string.
functions.summary: Tests if the passed $value is a string.

functions.name: na

returns.description: The error value #N/A. #N/A is the error value that means "no value is available."

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:NA the purpose of this function is to raise this error</xqdoc:error>
